experience.description: Lead development of mobile and web applications using React Native and modern web technologies. Mentor junior developers and collaborate with cross-functional teams.
achievements: Led a team of 4 developers in building a mobile app with 50K+ users
Reduced app loading time by 60% through performance optimization
Implemented CI/CD pipeline reducing deployment time by 80%
Mentored 3 junior developers who were promoted within 1 year

experience.description: Developed and maintained multiple web applications and mobile apps. Worked closely with design and product teams to deliver high-quality user experiences.
achievements: Built 3 mobile applications from scratch using React Native
Improved existing web application performance by 45%
Integrated third-party APIs and payment systems
Collaborated with UI/UX team to improve user engagement by 30%

experience.description: Focused on creating responsive and interactive user interfaces for various client projects. Collaborated with designers to implement pixel-perfect designs.
achievements: Delivered 15+ responsive websites with 99% client satisfaction
Reduced page load times by 50% through optimization techniques
Implemented modern JavaScript frameworks and build tools
Created reusable component library used across multiple projects
